{"id":900243998,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1676714554,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"141 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/900243998/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"96.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\nprivate:\n    int count = 0;\n\n    void dfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid, int i, int j) {\n\n        // counting the perimeters of the particular grid cell\n        if(i < 0 || i >= grid.size() || j < 0 || j >= grid[0].size() || grid[i][j] == 0) {\n            count++;\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // return, if the grid cell has already been visited\n        if(grid[i][j] == -1) {\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // marking the visited grid cell with -1\n        grid[i][j] = -1;\n\n        // search in all the four possible directions\n        dfs(grid, i + 1, j);\n        dfs(grid, i - 1, j);\n        dfs(grid, i, j + 1);\n        dfs(grid, i, j - 1);\n    }\n\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        count = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++) {\n                if(grid[i][j] == 1) {\n                    dfs(grid, i, j);\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return count;\n    }\n};\n\n\n// Time complexity is O(M*N)\n// Space complexity is O(1)","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
